lead_paragraph: BARTFELD--Dr. Charles I.,Professor Emeritus at American University, died peacefully at his home in Bethesda, MD on February 18, 2016, surrounded by his family. Dr. Bartfeld, who immigrated to Palestine from Vienna in 1938, was inducted into the Haganah, and also served in the British Army. Dr. Bartfeld joined the Israel Defense Forces where he played an active role in the defense of the newly established State of Israel. He is survived by his wife of 55 years, Ruth; three children, Esther, Judi and Daniel; and their families. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BARTFELD, DR. CHARLES I.
